text: Philip Eugene Batt (March 4, 1927 â€“ March 4, 2023) was an American politician. He is a member of the Republican Party. He was the 29th Governor of Idaho serving from 1995 to 1999. Between 1979 until 1983, Batt was the Lieutenant Governor of Idaho. He was born in Wilder, Idaho Jacque Batt died on September 7, 2014, after 66 years of marriage. In 2015, at the age of 88, Batt married Francee Riley of Boise. Batt died on March 4, 2023, the morning of his 96th birthday in Boise, Idaho. ==References== ==Other websites== * Idaho Public Television: Phil Batt * The Almanac of American Politics: Phil Batt * National Governors Association Category:1927 births Category:2023 deaths Category:Governors of Idaho Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Lieutenant Governors of Idaho Category:Members of the Idaho Legislature
title: Phil Batt
